line_1: No good comes on it when one lingers —
line_2: I'll play the card comes next my fingers —

line_1: With hopeless wish one looks and lingers,
line_2: One breaks the glass and cuts his fingers,

line_1: About it and about it lingers,
line_2: And counts his feet upon his fingers;

line_1: That he who after knowledge lingers
line_2: But grasps a flame, and burns his fingers;
